item.title: Applicant Tracking System (ATS)
item.description: Project Overview The Applicant Management System is a full-stack web application I developed to streamline applicant data management and document generation. Built with Laravel for a robust backend and Angular for a dynamic frontend, this system enables administrators to manage applicant records, filter data interactively, and generate consolidated PDF reports from various file types (DOCX, PDFs, images). Hosted on AWS, it demonstrates my expertise in delivering scalable, user-focused solutions. Technologies Used Backend: PHP, Laravel, DomPDF, Fpdi, PhpWord
